front.title: SPEERMINT Requirements for SIP-based VoIP Interconnection

abstract.t: A number of use cases have been identified for session peering of voice and other types of multimedia traffic. This memo captures some of the requirements that enable these use case scenarios. In its current version, this document describes both general and use case specific requirements for session peering for multimedia interconnect. It is intended to become an informational document linking the use cases with potential protocol solutions.
